scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes to inflict damage.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames that may also leave the target with a burn.

flame_burst.name: Flame Burst
flame_burst.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame that damages nearby allies.

water_gun.name: Water Gun
water_gun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

bubble_beam.name: Bubble Beam
bubble_beam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target.

hydro_pump.name: Hydro Pump
hydro_pump.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

blast_burns.name: Blast Burns
blast_burns.description: The user unleashes a powerful blast of scorching flames that has a chance to burn the target.

poison_sting.name: Poison Sting
poison_sting.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger that may poison the target.

thunder_wave.name: Thunder Wave
thunder_wave.description: A weak electric charge that paralyzes the target.

sleep_powder.name: Sleep Powder
sleep_powder.description: A cloud of sleep-inducing powder that may put the target to sleep.

confuse_ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse_ray.description: A sinister ray that confuses the target.

will_o_wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
will_o_wisp.description: A sinister flame that burns the target.

sword_dance.name: Sword Dance
sword_dance.description: A dance that sharpens the user's attack.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: The user attacks with an intense blast of all-consuming fire that may burn the target, lower its special defense, and boost the user's special attack.

hyper_beam.name: Hyper Beam
hyper_beam.description: The user attacks the target with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to recharge.

sky_attack.name: Sky Attack
sky_attack.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also cause the target to flinch.

twoTurnMove.chargingMessage: is glowing with a bright light!

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: The user soars up on the first turn, then strikes the target on the second turn.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: The user burrows underground on the first turn, then attacks on the second turn.

dive.name: Dive
dive.description: The user dives underwater on the first turn, then strikes on the second turn.

phantom_force.name: Phantom Force
phantom_force.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

shadow_force.name: Shadow Force
shadow_force.description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

bullet_seed.name: Bullet Seed
bullet_seed.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

triple_kick.name: Triple Kick
triple_kick.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

population_bomb.name: Population Bomb
population_bomb.description: The user's companions gather to perform a combo attack that hits one to ten times in a row.

fire_spin.name: Fire Spin
fire_spin.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

sand_tomb.name: Sand Tomb
sand_tomb.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

magma_storm.name: Magma Storm
magma_storm.description: The target is trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

quick_attack.name: Quick Attack
quick_attack.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

extreme_speed.name: Extreme Speed
extreme_speed.description: The user charges the target with blinding speed. This move has high priority.

fake_out.name: Fake Out
fake_out.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

sucker_punch.name: Sucker Punch
sucker_punch.description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

bullet_punch.name: Bullet Punch
bullet_punch.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

mach_punch.name: Mach Punch
mach_punch.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

vacuum_wave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuum_wave.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

ice_shard.name: Ice Shard
ice_shard.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

shadow_sneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadow_sneak.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

aqua_jet.name: Aqua Jet
aqua_jet.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

mirror_coat.name: Mirror Coat
mirror_coat.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

focus_punch.name: Focus Punch
focus_punch.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.description: An attack that inflicts double damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.
